name: perl-cpan-meta-check

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This module verifies if requirements described in a CPAN::Meta object
are present..

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime
dependent_to.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependent_to.name: perl-moose
dependent_to.description: A postmodern object system for Perl 5
